Hello {{firstName}},

Thank you so much for your interest in Orb Real Time Analytics! Unfortunately, we are currently unable to generate a code for access to the alpha version of our product, but your email has been added to a waitlist and you will be among the first to be notified when we're able to increase capacity. Please feel free to reach out to us at orbrealtimeanalytics@gmail.com if you have any questions or feedback.
